required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Physician Volumetric Accuracy During Filler Injections
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Physician Volumetric Accuracy During Hyaluronic Acid Soft Tissue Filler Injections and the Effect of Products' Biophysical Properties on an Injector's Performance: An Observational, Proof-of-concept Study

brief_summary.textblock:
Objectives
1. Evaluate the ability of aesthetic physicians to accurately inject a specific amount (i.e., 0.2cc) of HA soft tissue filler; and
2. Investigate the effect of different HA gel properties (e.g., G', cohesivity, viscoelasticity) on an injector's performance accuracy.

primary_outcome.measure: Volumetric accuracy of HA filler injections using observational methods
primary_outcome.description: physicians will attempt to inject 0.2CC of four HA products into a porcine membrane. Volumes will be measured in CC's and their accuracy assessed based on the amount of product left in the syringe.

primary_outcome.measure: Volumetric accuracy of HA filler expulsions over a scale
primary_outcome.description: Physicians will attempt to dispense 0.2CC of four different HA products. They will do this into free air, over a scale. The weights will be calculated in grams and converted to CC's. The scale is the "Smart Weight" digital milligram scale, JDS20 edition. It's specifications are as follows: capacity: 20g/100ct/308.8gn/12.86dwt; readability: 0.001g/0.005ct/0.02gn/0.001dwt; scale dimensions: 3x5x0.8"; accuracy of 0.001grams and capacity of 20grams.

intervention.description: Subjects will be blind folded and asked to deposit 0.2cc's of each of the four investigational products, in a randomized order. First, over a weight and then into a porcine membrane.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Board-certified plastic surgeon, dermatologist, or oculoplastic surgeon.
Exclusion Criteria:
- N/A
